resources.string: Enter OTP Number , Which You Have Received By SMS

Paisa Nikal is India's one of its kind payment marketplace, which offers one-stop solution for all kinds of payments.

 Paisa Nikal empowers merchants/traders/small business to collect payment from customers in a hassle-free way. Experience ease of digital payment and power your business. 

 With the power of Mobile and Aadhaar, we have made it our mission to transform our nation’s retail stores into Digital Marts. Our Retail store is the future ‘Digital Sevak’ and will lead the movement to digitize cash by offering services like Domestic Money Transfer (DMT), Aadhaar Enabled Payment Service (AEPS), Recharge and Bill Payments.
You need to give SMS permission to automatically read OTP.
You need to give Location permission.
Timer Expired, Please click here to resend otp

string-array.name: faq_que
string-array.item: 1.What are the services available under AePS?
2.What are the benefits of AePS?
3.What is eKYC Service ?
4.Which biometric device supports by Yes Bank AePS?
5.Amount has deducted from customer bank account but not showing in my wallet?
6.How to treat fail / Unknown Transactions?
7.What if the amount not credited in customers account in 24 hours?
8.What if the amount not credited in customers account in 24 hours and Customer doesn\'t come to Agent?

string-array.name: faq_ans
string-array.item: •Balance Enquiry\n •Cash Withdrawal\n •Cash Deposit (Currently Disabled)

Aadhaar enabled Payment System is easy to use, safe and secure payment platform to avail benefits by using Aadhaar number & biometrics. \n
Aadhaar enabled Payment System facilitates inter-operability across banks in a safe and secured manner Reaching the unreached - The model enable banks to extend financial services to the unreached clients beyond their branch network as beneficiaries of the BCs are mostly located at unbanked and underbanked areas

eKYC is Electronic Know Your Customer. It is an electronic way of doing real time KYC of a customer using Aadhaar authentication. The Customer has to provide his/her Aadhaar number and biometrics. eKYC enables an organization to get electronic copy of customer identity and address details, as present in UIDAI database, with customer consent.
Mantra, MORPHO, secugen , Persona , Smartek

Do probing that has he activated auto credit to bank option. If he has enabled this option than amount will credit into his account within 2 working days from the date of transaction if not we will raise complaint and create a ticket for the same.

Cash withdrawal - in case of cash-withdrawal if amount got debited from customers account and is not credited in Agents wallet kindly treat this as FAIL and do not handover the amount to customer. Customers Bank will settle the amount back in his account. Kindly ask customer to check the same from his bank.\n\n Cash Deposit - In case cash deposit if amount got debited from your Agent wallet and is not credited in Customers bank account kindly treat this as SUCCESS and take the money customer. In most of the cases the same get settled in customer account in 24 Hours.

In this case amount is not credited in customers account in 24 hours the transaction is a FAIL.\n\n
Post BIO metric verification amount will be credited back in Agent wallet. Now Agent can give cash back to Customer.
In absence of customer claim the fail amount will be auto settled in Agents wallet at T+5 Days.
